'''Kindlejoy''' is an event-exclusive variant of the '''Whirling Pyro Fungus''' that appears in the [[Lil' Fungi's Fun-Tastic Fiesta]] event.

==Abilities==
{{Enemy Attacks
|enemy       = Whirling Pyro Fungus V3

|name_1      = Incinerating Field
|desc_1      = Condenses the power of Pyro and enters the Incineration state, continuously dealing '''90% ATK''' as {{Color|Pyro DMG}} to nearby opponents every '''0.5''' seconds for a total of '''9''' seconds. Normal Attacks cannot be performed while in this state, but its movement is not affected. 

|name_2      = Fiery Combustion
|desc_2      = When "Incinerating Field" is unleashed, Kindlejoy's Physical and All Elemental RES are increased by '''70%'''.

|name_3      = Normal Attack
|desc_3      = Unleashes a Blazing Flame, dealing '''300% ATK''' as {{Color|Pyro DMG}} to nearby opponents.
}}
